atomic_tests.name: Trap EXIT
atomic_tests.description:
Launch bash shell with command arg to create TRAP on EXIT.
The trap executes script that writes to /tmp/art-fish.txt

atomic_tests.name: Trap EXIT (freebsd)
atomic_tests.description:
Launch bash shell with command arg to create TRAP on EXIT.
The trap executes script that writes to /tmp/art-fish.txt

dependencies.prereq_command: if [ ! -x "$(command -v bash)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi;

atomic_tests.name: Trap SIGINT
atomic_tests.description:
Launch bash shell with command arg to create TRAP on SIGINT (CTRL+C), then send SIGINT signal.
The trap executes script that writes to /tmp/art-fish.txt

atomic_tests.name: Trap SIGINT (freebsd)
atomic_tests.description:
Launch bash shell with command arg to create TRAP on SIGINT (CTRL+C), then send SIGINT signal.
The trap executes script that writes to /tmp/art-fish.txt

dependencies.prereq_command: if [ ! -x "$(command -v bash)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi;
